channel.title: Need Help With Some Things. [DELTA]
channel.description: 1. KBD is 2k hp. 2. PC Rewards, I have to use 2 different npc's to give the armor and exp. 3. Speaking of PC, I want the wait to be 3 minutes instead of 8. 4. Also, When I kill a portal, sometimes it doesn't die. 5. Fightcaves, npc's don't spawn correctly, as in, I kill one, another won't spawn. 6. I want to change the home to Edgeville. 7. I want to change a few teleports on the multi teleport.

item.title: Need Help With Some Things. [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @syracusepker94 syracusepker94
item.description:
@syracusepker94 wrote:

fine the commands section of your client.java, then find the “Home” command and change the coords to a spot in edgeville. you can also change it so when u die you spawn in edgeville by searching the coords of the spot you spawn in lumby and then change them. keep in mind that you spawn in different spots, im not sure what the main coord is.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With Some Things. [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

All of this can be done in the client.java, just search related terms. As for PC, you most likely can find it in client.java, but look in one of the minigame.java files if you have one.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With Some Things. [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @iTanq iTanq
item.description:
@iTanq wrote:

  1. KBD is 2k hp.
  2. PC Rewards, I have to use 2 different npc’s to give the armor and exp.
  3. Speaking of PC, I want the wait to be 3 minutes instead of 8.
  4. Also, When I kill a portal, sometimes it doesn’t die.
  5. Fightcaves, npc’s don’t spawn correctly, as in, I kill one, another won’t spawn.
  6. I want to change the home to Edgeville.
  7. I want to change a few teleports on the multi teleport.

Read full topic
